Title: Heart-to-heart talk
Publisher: Renmin meishu chubanshe (人民美术出版社)
Notes: Mao Zedong chatting with peasants, probably in northern Shaanxi, where artist Liu Wenxi lived, worked and found his inspiration, and where Yan'an is located. The painting reproduced on this poster is from 1974, and in the collection of the National Art Museum of China.
